mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM boards ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT b.id, b.title, u.username FROM boards b JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE boards SET usersId = null WHERE usersId = #{id}
